intel-icl.notes: Deprecated. TDP information not immediately easy to find.

intel-spr.notes: This is renamed, and is a member of the Intel Xeon family. See linked datasheet for more details.

intel-xeon.notes: There are 2 types of Intel Xeons, one with up to 40 cores (which uses max 270 W) and one with up to 28 cores (which uses 250 W). Providing the max value here; not sure which is being used under the hood. See linked datasheet for more details.

nvidia-a100.notes: There are 2 possible A100s: Nvidia HGX (400 W) and 40GB PCle (250 W). Providing the max value here; not sure which is being used under the hood. See linked datasheet for more details.

notes: There are 2 possible H100s: H100 SXM (700 W) and H100 NVL (350-400 W). Providing the max value here; not sure which is being used under the hood. See linked datasheet for more details.
